title: Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" Lightweight Hardside Suitcase With Silent Spinner Wheels; Purple;  21" carry-on hardside underseat luggage; Color: Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, Light Purple; ABS hard shell, steel rod; Capacity: 33L; Size: 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76" (L x W x H); Weight: 5.62lb; 360 degree silent double spinner wheels
descriptions:
Introducing the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20"! This hardside underseat luggage is the perfect companion for your 1-3 day trips. Made with a durable ABS hard shell material and a strong steel rod handle, this suitcase is built to withstand the rigors of travel.

Choose from a variety of stylish colors including Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, and Light Purple. With a capacity of 33 liters, you'll have plenty of space to pack all your essentials. The dimensions of this luggage are 21.85 inches in length, 8.35 inches in width, and 14.76 inches in height. It weighs just 5.62 pounds, making it lightweight and easy to carry.

The 360 degree silent double spinner wheels ensure smooth and effortless maneuverability. You'll love the convenience of the TSA lock, providing added security for your belongings. 

Inside, you'll find a mesh zip pocket and elasticated straps to keep your items organized and secure. The full capacity design maximizes the use of space and the scratch-resistant interior ensures your luggage stays looking its best.

With its high durability and lightweight design, the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" is the perfect choice for your next trip. Don't miss out on this incredible suitcase!

**Description:**

Introducing the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20"! This high-quality hardside suitcase is perfect for your 1-3 day trips. Made from durable ABS hard shell material, it can withstand impact and scratches, ensuring your belongings stay safe during your travels.

The luggage comes in a variety of stylish colors including Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, and Light Purple, allowing you to choose the one that best suits your style. The dimensions of this suitcase are 21.85 inches in length, 8.35 inches in width, and 14.76 inches in height, providing ample space for your essentials.

With a capacity of 33L, this suitcase offers plenty of room for your clothes, toiletries, and other travel necessities. The four 360-degree silent double spinner wheels make maneuvering through crowded airports a breeze. The steel rod handle, made from durable and sturdy material, ensures easy and comfortable handling.

For added security, this luggage features a TSA lock, providing peace of mind during your journey. The interior of the suitcase is designed with a mesh zip pocket and elasticated straps, allowing you to keep your belongings organized.

Weighing just 5.62lb, this suitcase is lightweight and easy to carry. Its high durability and scratch resistance make it a reliable companion for all your travels. The adjustable TPR soft handle, made from stainless steel, offers three different lengths for your convenience.

Upgrade your travel experience with the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20"! Experience the convenience, durability, and security it offers. Order now and embark on your next adventure with style!
